ygData.subject: A Few Things
ygData.msgSnippet: First That no drop/trade trick is excellent... But, JBoots and many other crazy items can be given to others that way. Unless we keep our mouths tight about
ygData.messageBody:
First
That no drop/trade trick is excellent...
But, JBoots and many other crazy items can be given to others that way.
Unless we keep our mouths' tight about this, prepare for that to go away
next patch.

Secondly,
The Ice Comet Quest begins in Everfrost, that is all i know. I'm only level
25 and I can believe that the quest is designed to be much, much higher than
that but, I wan't to know what is needed, so I can begin to look now. And if
it's item related, I have the cash to purchase those items from people who
might not know any better.

Third,
I am still trying to get the Council of Wizardry started on Karana, but
there doesn't seem to be enough people to make it. I really need help on
this. Should I conform and make it the *Council of Magi and open it to all
four mage classes?
I've been in a few guilds and none so far concentrated on roleplay, player
driven quests, and helping each other quest for adnventure/knowledge/items.
(So that is why I've been in a few guilds. A collection of people isn't
enough for this wizard.) Those of you on Karana or know some other mage
classes on Karana who might be interested or could offer some advice, please
drop me a line...


*or Council of Roke (if you're familiar with the Wizard of Earthsea books)

Thanks,
Telor Strifesage - Karana
